context:

[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 7 (sum of [Combustion] and [Vibration] on target) (max 2)

original:
[WhenUse] 対象の[Combustion]と[Vibration]の合計7につき、コイン威力 +1 (最大2)
[DefeatDuel] ダメージ量が75%だけ減少し、このスキルのダメージによって対象が混乱しない
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[WhenUse] 対象の[Combustion]と[Vibration]の合計7につき、コイン威力 +1 (最大2)
[DefeatDuel] ダメージ量が75%だけ減少し、このスキルのダメージによって対象が混乱しない
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[WhenUse] 대상의 [Combustion]과 [Vibration]의 합 7 당, 코인 위력 +1 (최대 2)
[DefeatDuel] 피해량이 75%만큼 감소하고 이 스킬의 피해로 대상이 흐트러지지 않음
EN:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 7 (sum of [Combustion] and [Vibration] on target) (max 2)
[DefeatDuel] Deal -75% damage and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target

KR:
[SuperCoin]
EN:
[SuperCoin]

KR:
[BudgetBulletPropellant] 1 소모
EN:
Spend 1 [BudgetBulletPropellant]

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Vibration] 4 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [Vibration]

KR:
[OnSucceedAttack] [Combustion] 4 부여
EN:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [Combustion]

KR:
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] [VibrationIgnition]로 [Switch_Vibration]
EN:
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Trigger [Switch_Vibration] into [VibrationIgnition]

KR:
[SuperCoin]
EN:
[SuperCoin]

KR:
[BudgetBulletPropellant] 1 소모.
EN:
Spend 1 [BudgetBulletPropellant]

KR:
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] [VibrationExplosion]. 대상의 [Vibration] 횟수 1 감소
EN:
[UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

KR:
추진탄 재장전
EN:
Propellant Ammo Reload

original:
[StartBattle] [FullReload] (1ターンにつき1回)
[WhenUse] 対象の[Combustion]と[Vibration]の合計が6以上なら、コイン +3
[WhenUse] 次のターンに[AttackDmgUp]1を得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
[StartBattle] [FullReload] (1ターンにつき1回)
[WhenUse] 対象の[Combustion]と[Vibration]の合計が6以上なら、コイン +3
[WhenUse] 次のターンに[AttackDmgUp]1を得る
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_EN>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
[StartBattle] [FullReload] (턴 당 1회)
[WhenUse] 대상의 [Combustion]과 [Vibration]의 합이 6 이상이면, 코인 위력 +3
[WhenUse] 다음 턴에 [AttackDmgUp] 1 얻음
EN:
[StartBattle] [FullReload] (once per turn)
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ (sum of [Combustion] and [Vibration]), Coin Power +3
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] next turn
